mission.title: Our Vision
mission.content: Mindful is dedicated to providing simple and accessible meditation learning resources and practice tools for everyone seeking inner peace. We believe meditation shouldn't be complicated or mysteriousâ€”it's a daily practice anyone can easily begin.

features.title: What We Offer
features.item1: Complete meditation curriculum from beginner to advanced
features.item2: Interactive practice tools: breathing, focus, relaxation, and guided meditation
features.item3: Rich ambient sounds and meditation timer
features.item4: Local practice tracking to follow your meditation journey

start.title: Start Your Meditation Journey
start.content: Whether you're a complete beginner or a practitioner looking to deepen your practice, there's something here for you. Start today with just a few minutes, and experience the peace and calm within.
